rukus.text: wa-ila madyana akhahum shuʿayban qala yaqawmi uʿ'budu l-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu qad jaatkum bayyinatun min rabbikum fa-awfu l-kayla wal-mizana wala tabkhasu l-nasa ashyaahum wala tuf'sidu fi l-ardi baʿda is'lahiha dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minina
wala taqʿudu bikulli siratin tuʿiduna watasudduna ʿan sabili l-lahi man amana bihi watabghunaha ʿiwajan wa-udh'kuru idh kuntum qalilan fakatharakum wa-unzuru kayfa kana ʿaqibatu l-muf'sidina
wa-in kana taifatun minkum amanu bi-alladhi ur'sil'tu bihi wataifatun lam yu'minu fa-is'biru hatta yahkuma l-lahu baynana wahuwa khayru l-hakimina
qala l-mala-u alladhina is'takbaru min qawmihi lanukh'rijannaka yashuʿaybu wa-alladhina amanu maʿaka min qaryatina aw lataʿudunna fi millatina qala awalaw kunna karihina

qadi if'tarayna ʿala l-lahi kadhiban in ʿud'na fi millatikum baʿda idh najjana l-lahu min'ha wama yakunu lana an naʿuda fiha illa an yashaa l-lahu rabbuna wasiʿa rabbuna kulla shayin ʿil'man ʿala l-lahi tawakkalna rabbana if'tah baynana wabayna qawmina bil-haqi wa-anta khayru l-fatihina
waqala l-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi la-ini ittabaʿtum shuʿayban innakum idhan lakhasiruna
fa-akhadhathumu l-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
alladhina kadhabu shuʿayban ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha alladhina kadhabu shuʿayban kanu humu l-khasirina
fatawalla ʿanhum waqala yaqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risalati rabbi wanasahtu lakum fakayfa asa ʿala qawmin kafirina
